hackathon-description-text: As part of Global Entrepreneurship Week Acorn Aspirations in partnership with UnLtd is organising a 2-day Hackathon-style event where young people aged 16-19 will collaborate with University tech students and mentors from the TechCity community to develop digital solutions to social problems in their local communities and worldwide.
hackathon-rules:
AcornHack is dedicated to providing a fun, harassment-free experience for everyone. We expect all of our attendees, sponsors, volunteers and staff to be respected and considerate of others. All participants will be required to agree to the 
. Organisers will enforce it throughout the event.

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Winners get to demo their project at the TechHub Demo Day, will be invited for 'Get your pitch right' Masterclass from Will King!
Tour of Google Campus and Ropemaker's sites from TechHub
Every idea is eligible for a grant from Unltd to carry on with development
Makers Academy will offer a £500 discount on a 12-week course to every participant over the age of 18
Every team that participates will get 3 free workshops from Codecademy - UX, HTML and CSS
Every team receives a copy of Rob Fitzpatrick's The Mom Test: How to talk to customers & learn if your business is a good idea when everyone is lying to you
